fields.headline: Quick getaways
fields.bodyText: Under £100 The Capital Hotel in Basil Street, Chelsea, has room-only deals for £99 until 31 August. Reservations (020 7589 5171). Yards from Harvey Nicks for a shopping spree. Under £300 Blow into Bruges on Wednesday 21 August for four nights and see the arrival of the Tall Ships Race at nearby Zeebrugge (trains every half hour for this short trip). You can tour the ships for a small charge. Four nights B&B at the modern, central Grand Hotel Oude Burg and Eurostar travel is £259 with ShortBreaks (020 8402 0007). Until 31 August Eurocity Breaks (0870 709 3034) has two nights accommodation with buffet breakfast at the deluxe Maritim proArte Hotel in Berlin with BA flights from Gatwick or Heathrow for £225. Under £400 A seven-night B&B budget beach break on Bulgaria's Black Sea coast with Balkan Holidays (0845 130 1114). From £315, leaving 23 August, accommodation allocated on arrival. Flights from Edinburgh, Glasgow and Manchester. Under £500 Two weeks for the price of one is on offer on the Greek island of Samos with Laskarina (01629 822203). The accommodation is in the Posidonion Beach Apartments, the cost is £499 (based on two sharing). Departures are from Manchester or Gatwick on 22 August. Under £700 Tax free shopping in Dubai from £649 (a saving of £89). Five nights at the four star Le Meridien Mina Seyahi Beach Resort departing between 20 August and 11 September. Price includes accommodation with breakfast, transfers and flights from Heathrow, Gatwick, Manchester or Birmingham. Thomas Cook Holidays (0870 443 4448) Under £800 For £710 (based on eight sharing) seven nights self-catering at Villa Capo d'Orso between Cala Capra and Portu Mannu in Sardinia. Departing 24 August. Includes flights from Gatwick and car hire. Simply Sardinia (020 8541 2213). The Cruise Line (0845 1300 360) has six nights on the QE2 to New York departing Southampton 20 August reduced from £1,959 to £799. On-board food, return flight and transfer included. Fourteen nights half board at the Hotel Villa Bianca near Taormina in Sicily costs £799 departing Gatwick on 24 August. Includes flights and transfers. Holiday Options (0870 013 0450). £779 for a four night trip to Memphis for Elvis fans with America Direct (0870 889 0827). Depart 28 August from Gatwick or Manchester for four nights B&B accommodation at the three star Heartbreak Hotel. Includes transfers and tickets to Graceland. Reduces to £669 in September. Under £900 Leave 24 August for the Lofoten Islands off Norway lodging seven nights in a fisherman's cabin jutting over the water on stilts. Price of £893 includes three days' car hire. Heathrow to Bodo via Oslo and four internal flights. Inntravel (01653 629030). Over £2,000 Trailfinders (020 7938 3444/020 7628 2345) is currently offering a unique three night first class weekend break to New York for £2079. The outbound flight is on Concorde which gets there in just under three and a half hours. The return is BA World Traveller class. Price includes three nights accommodation at the Philippe Starck designed Paramount Hotel near Times Square. Must be booked by 31 August for travel in November 2002. · All prices per person unless stated.
